column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday December 12 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Advisory for E Third St:
column4: Roadway shutdown between Race St and Shropshire Ave due to a gas leak.

column3: Traffic Advisory for E Third St:
column4: Detour via Race St → Fourth St → Shropshire Ave.

column3: US-27 at N Main St in Jessamine Co:
column4: Overturned tanker truck with gasoline and diesel spill.  Roadway shutdown in both directions until further notice.

column3: US-27 at N Main St in Jessamine Co:
column4: Motorists can utilize Keene Rd/KY-169 → Harrodsburg Rd → Catnip Hill Rd/KY-3375.
